name: get_location_infomation_by_zipcode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool redfin_base.
Tool description: [IMPROVED SEARCH API]  API Redfin offers a powerful search feature that allows users to easily find their desired properties. With the search tool, users can refine their search based on location, price range, property type, and various other criteria. They can also customize their search by specifying the number of bedrooms and bathrooms, square footage, and other specific features they are looking for in a home. Redfin's search feature provides accurate and up-to-date results, helping users...
API description: Fetches the location information for a given ZIP code using the Redfin API.

zipcode.description: The ZIP code for which to fetch the location information.
